item.title: RB 2025-05-29 102757
item.description: Development Todo List (05-29-2025) General TODO Remove davis@usernote.io lucky/kiwi GCP Auth screen AAStore/Playtime SDK upgrade to 3.1.0: playful rewards [Note: At top right corner there appears to be “RocketBook ‚Üí Tape” crossed out, replaced with “RocketBook ‚Üí markdown ‚Üí obsidian”] Server TODO Save new onboarding kiwi Data Add promo code endpoint Add 10% boost functionality Swap remaining keys Update Applovin to support kiwi Add new Kiwi content sections Game Section Horizontal Hotlink Section Level up Game Overview Client TODO Update app-id to be kiwi Update DoB + Gender to match fetch Update last name autofill [Note: There appears to be “sync/api” notation next to some of the client TODO items]
item.content:
Development Todo List (05-29-2025)

General TODO

  • Remove davis@usernote.io lucky/kiwi GCP Auth screen
  • AAStore/Playtime SDK upgrade to 3.1.0: playful rewards

[Note: At top right corner there appears to be “RocketBook ‚Üí Tape” crossed out, replaced with “RocketBook ‚Üí markdown ‚Üí obsidian”]

Server TODO

  • Save new onboarding kiwi Data
  • Add promo code endpoint
  • Add 10% boost functionality
  • Swap remaining keys
  • Update Applovin to support kiwi
  • Add new Kiwi content sections
    • Game Section Horizontal
    • Hotlink Section
  • Level up Game Overview

Client TODO

  • Update app-id to be kiwi
  • Update DoB + Gender to match fetch
  • Update last name autofill

[Note: There appears to be “sync/api” notation next to some of the client TODO items]

item.title: RB 2025-06-02 093308

item.content:
Project Notes: Tuned Global & Scoring System

Call Notes:

  • Tuned Global
  • Apps to see:
    • Search/Rec APIs
    • Existing: Many object search (Rec contextual to store)
    • Upcoming
  • AltDoc shutting us off (traffic ‚Üí)
  • update package from [unclear] Mega
  • AppLovin Rewarded Videos Ad

Systems

[Box Diagram] Wilson scoring system ‚Üì Elastic Scoring system

Store Details

  • TikTok in store???
  • 3% margin to user
  • APB for us üòÑ

Music Integration

[Box Diagram] Universal Music Group in Tuned Catalogue Music in Demo

Pre-tagging Tuned Global for Cold Start

[Box Diagram] Playful Rewards (userwise) Playful Rhythm

Parameters:

  • per hour
  • all packages
  • Android only

Todo Items

  • Figures out issue with guided install
  • UW optimizations + segment optimizations
  • PR Android app time rollup tracking
  • Rhythm?

RELEASE

UW Updates ‚Üí Time Tracking ‚Üí Segment Updates (Easy filtering?) ‚Üí Rhythm

[Note: There are several boxes/diagrams drawn in blue ink throughout the notes, connecting various concepts and systems]

item.title: RB 2025-06-02 093312
item.description: LED Strip Controller System Notes System Architecture Computer/Server -> MQTT PI -> LED Strip 5v External [diagram shows power connection] Components LED Strip Simulator(?) Note: Handwriting Pic -> upload Tags Configuration interval = “daily” / “hourly” package-name = "" Workers AppPlayTimeSchedulerWorker AppPlayTimeTrackingWorker Scheduling Details Sched Worker (run every hour) Pull tracking worker scheduling/config Work Flow graph TD A[Remote] --> B[get/save config] B --> C[Stored Pref] C --> D[interval] C --> E[package-name] D --> F[Tracking Worker] Calculations A16Z ?
item.content:
LED Strip Controller System Notes

System Architecture

  • Computer/Server -> MQTT PI -> LED Strip
  • 5v External [diagram shows power connection]

Components

  • LED Strip Simulator(?)
  • Note: Handwriting
  • Pic -> upload
  • Tags

Configuration

  • interval = “daily” / “hourly”
  • package-name = ""

Workers

  • AppPlayTimeSchedulerWorker
  • AppPlayTimeTrackingWorker

Scheduling Details

  • Sched Worker (run every hour)
  • Pull tracking worker scheduling/config

Work Flow

graph TD
A[Remote] --> B[get/save config]
B --> C[Stored Pref]
C --> D[interval]
C --> E[package-name]
D --> F[Tracking Worker]

Calculations

  • A16Z ?!?!?!
  • A16 speed Run
  • 16 x 12
  • 12
  • 16 + 4
  • 10 x 12

Events

  • Amplitude Events
  • ‚àö2 3.14

Additional Notes

  • Conv Rate w/ Adam [unclear]
  • “Hmm… Feeling good”
  • Take CPI then spread it out

Tracking Worker Details

  • Every 5 minutes
  • Run @ interval (daily)
  • Only query for this every $ 1 day
  • Query was processed?
  • If hourly -> has it been >= 1 hour?
  • If daily -> has it been >= 1 day?

[Note: The image contains various interconnected diagrams and flow charts drawn in blue ink, with boxes and arrows indicating relationships between different components]

item.title: RB 2025-06-02 093319
item.description: Development Planning Notes Prayful Releases v2.3.3 (Attribution) Live v2.3.3 (Social Auth) Test + Prod v2.3.4 (App Usage Offer Filtering) v2.3.5 (Onboarding Wizard v2) Social Auth Implementation OAuth/OpenID [Several items crossed out, appears to be a matrix of authentication providers] Userwise Merge to Prod Frontend Change Sync? Workers dying Global Remote Config Worker Job (TIME Advancement) Push Notifications (Scheduled Send) Update segment concrete to use code + time Query Optimizations Journey Step Pathing (Client) Journey Step Event Template Enable Shack ARM Additional Notes TikTok + FB + Apps Fight deep link data [in box drawing] Search RPI focus; get client ROI$ Visibility & Observability for Business Analytics [with eye symbol drawing] Servers/IAP changes to test up cred test$ Get $200 by spending $175 Client ROI$ means pushing a focus on IAP$ Future Plans Big Updates Now then Analytics revamp
item.content:
Development Planning Notes

Prayful Releases

  • v2.3.3 (Attribution) Live
  • v2.3.3 (Social Auth) Test + Prod
  • v2.3.4 (App Usage Offer Filtering)
  • v2.3.5 (Onboarding Wizard v2)

Social Auth Implementation

OAuth/OpenID

[Several items crossed out, appears to be a matrix of authentication providers]

Userwise

  • Merge to Prod
  • Frontend Change Sync?
  • Workers dying
  • Global Remote Config
  • Worker Job (TIME Advancement)
  • Push Notifications (Scheduled Send)
  • Update segment concrete to use code + time
  • Query Optimizations
  • Journey Step Pathing (Client)
  • Journey Step Event Template
  • Enable Shack
  • ARM

Additional Notes

  • TikTok + FB + Apps Fight deep link data [in box drawing]
  • Search RPI focus; get client ROI$
  • Visibility & Observability for Business Analytics [with eye symbol drawing]
  • Servers/IAP changes to test up cred test$
  • Get $200 by spending $175
  • Client ROI$ means pushing a focus on IAP$

Future Plans

Big Updates Now then Analytics revamp

[Note: Document contains various box drawings and dividing lines throughout]

item.title: RB 2025-06-02 093323
item.description: Project Planning Notes (2024-10-22) Physical Rewards Test Attribution Push Up Social Auth (Staging + Client Builds + Firebase) App Usage Tracking Sync w/ Adam: What are our goals exactly Here is what we provide summary Send Adam credentials.enc.yml changes for [feat-social-auth] Onboarding Wizard v2 (Quick vs Big) v2.3.4 Filter out Recently Played (90-days) ‚≠ê UserWise Mongo 5 -> 6 Staging 0Production Format Changes >_< Works during? Global Remote Config Works Job (time!
item.content:
Project Planning Notes (2024-10-22)

Physical Rewards

  • Test Attribution
  • Push Up Social Auth (Staging + Client Builds + Firebase)
  • App Usage Tracking Sync w/ Adam:
    • What are our goals exactly
    • Here is what we provide summary
  • Send Adam credentials.enc.yml changes for [feat-social-auth]
  • Onboarding Wizard v2 (Quick vs Big)

v2.3.4

Filter out Recently Played (90-days) ‚≠ê

UserWise

  • Mongo 5 -> 6
    • Staging 0Production
  • Format Changes >_<
  • Works during?
  • Global Remote Config
  • Works Job (time!)
  • Push Notifications (scheduled send)

[AUG] box drawn around “AUG”

PeopleFun Call Notes:

  • Q1/Q2 for LiveOps? UW then?
  • GCP??? Do we host for them?
  • How do we integrate UW <=> PT
    • UW would be a nice frontend
    • They would need custom features
  • Start SaaS -> Self-Hosted (pre-live)

Additional Notes

  • PubSub Realtime Flow
  • They provide segments to us.

Note: There is a “BCP” drawn at the bottom of the image

There’s also a box in the top right with “Push Our RTM, then backbone client Rocks”
